flashlight addons.name: Wide Lens
flashlight addons.effects: Increases width of beam by 15%, decreases beam range by 25%

flashlight addons.name: Power Bulb
flashlight addons.effects: Increases brightness of beam by 20%, increases blindness duration by 10%

flashlight addons.name: TIR Optic
flashlight addons.effects: Increases brightness by 30%, increases blindness duration by 15%

flashlight addons.name: Focus Lens
flashlight addons.effects: Extends range by 25%, increases brightness by 20%, increases blindness by 10%, decreases width by 15%

flashlight addons.name: Intense Halogen
flashlight addons.effects: Increases brightness by 40%, inreases blindness duration by 20%

flashlight addons.name: High-End Sapphire Lens
flashlight addons.effects: Increases range by 25%, increases brightness by 30%, increases blindness duration by 15%, increases width by 25%

flashlight addons.name: Odd Bulb
flashlight addons.effects: Increases brightness by 50%, increases blindness duration by 25%, increases depletion rate by 14%

flashlight addons.name: Broken Bulb
flashlight addons.effects: Causes the flashlight to flicker, increases brightness by 30%, increases blindness duration by 15%, increases spookiness

medkit addons.name: Rubber Gloves
medkit addons.effects: Increases Great Skill Check progression by 3%

Increases the progression bonus of Great Skill Checks by 5%
Increases available charges by 8, increases healing speed by 5%
Increases healing speed by 15%, increases trigger odds of Skill Checks by 10%, grants 100% bonus BP for Great Skill Checks
Increases healing speed by 15%, increases trigger odds of Skill Checks by 15%, grants 150% bonus BP for Great Skill Checks
Increases healing speed by 25%, decreases available charges by 8
Applies the Endurance status effect for 8 seconds
Over 16 seconds the survivor will gain 1 health state | medkit is consumed on use, affected by healing speed modifiers and cancelled by change of health state | can be used on self or other survivors
Increases movement speed by 5% for 16 seconds, leaves a Blight trail behind the affected survivor, consumes medkit on use and can be used on yourself or other survivors
Unlocks Aura reading ability to see all survivors within 24m
Unlocks Aura reading ability to see all survivors within 48m
On death, key is not lost, lose this addon instead.
Upon opening the hatch, key is not lost, lose this addon instead
Unlocks Aura reading ability to see the killer within 32m, increases depletion rate by 100%
Unlocks Aura reading ability to see the Obsession within 32m, lowers odds of becoming the Obsession by 100%
Unlocks the ability to track Exit Gates
Unlocks the ability to track killer belongings
Place a pillar of light at your current location that is visible to all survivors
Unlocks the ability to track the hatch
Reveals the Auras generated by the map to all survivors
Decreases distance repairs can be heard from by 8m
Removes the Loud Noise Notification from sabotaging a hook
Increases the auto repair timer for hooks sabotaged by 15 seconds

Takes 5 seconds to install, adds 15% to generator progression. Triggers 2 difficult skillchecks during installation process, successful completion adds 5% extra progression up to a total of 25% progression
